title: Bug splash every time I tried to start a game
body:
So every time I tried to start a game , the bug splash pops up and I can't reconnect as it will pop up again. I tried reinstalling my client but it didn't work.
Is there a fix to this?

replies.body: I have the same issue started 2 days ago!!! please let me know if you find a fix :(

Rid yourself of the pests which harass your gameplay by using the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/khazix_deathblossom_splash_1920x1080.jpg?itok=re5tY9ln https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2014/12/Death-Blossom-Elise.jpg
